get:/partitions/{partitionId}: Get all properties and their values for a given data partition id
post:/partitions/{partitionId}: Creates a new data partition with all given properties and their values.
delete:/partitions/{partitionId}: Delete all the properties of a given data partition
patch:/partitions/{partitionId}: Add new properties or update existing properties of a given data partition
get:/info: For deployment available public `/info` endpoint, which provides build and git related information.
